metadata.title: CVE-2014-7818 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Directory traversal vulnerability inactionpack/lib/action_dispatch/middleware/static.rb in Action Pack in Rubyon Rails 3.x before 3.2.20, 4.0.x before 4.0.11, 4.1.x before 4.1.7, and4.2.x before 4.2.0.beta3, when serve_static_assets is enabled, allowsremote attackers to determine the existence of files outside theapplication root via a /..%2F sequence.

criterions.comment: ruby-rails-3.2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
ruby-actionpack-3.2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
rails-4.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
